title: Welcome to My Analytics Lab
text:
Hello! My name is Kerem Kaplan.
This is my personal webpage.
Please stay tuned to follow my works on data analytics, blog posts, and more.
This is our template.



 Back to top

title: About Me
text: I am a fourth-year student in the Department of Industrial Engineering at Hacettepe University. In addition to my courses, I have been actively involved in student organizations and participated various positions. In my final year, I am working as a junior engineer in the Production Planning Department at the Kırıkkale Refinery of Turkey’s Petroleum Refineries (TÜPRAŞ). Thanks to this experience, I am learning production planning methods and optimization calculations while also having the opportunity to work on data science.
